author: Jason
title: Sustainable Forest Stablecoin
description: High gas prices on Ethereum are crippling Ekofolio's vision of frictionless issuance and trade of Stablecoins backed by Natural Capital.

assessments.note: Switching to Cardano from Ethereum would effectively reduce the fees that are obstructing further adoption of this token
If the proposer is able to deliver, a forest backed token could have great value to investors and the lands that are bought and sustainably used.

There is a lack of information about how feasible the project is in its current instance on Ethereum. No metrics for user adoption since launch or even the real unique selling point of using this token over a normal algo backed stablecoin.
There are no benchmarks from the protocol's stats live on Ethereum listed in the proposal. No technical docs which would greatly clarify the value prop of this dApp.

Its a beautiful project and has enormous potential for further expansion and developments to promote more reforestation and carbon offsetting potentials. I like the idea of connecting it to the blockchain and for its transition into Cardano network.

This proposal seeks to solve important problems in the world while benefiting both Cardano and Ekofolio. It addresses the challenge because it helps a company adopt Cardano. It will likely bring positive attention to Cardano as well.
Very well presented proposal. Interesting idea.
Interesting proposal but no reference to the current user base or transaction flow makes this proposal not effective in addressing the challenge.
The team is well experienced and they have a solid base, ready to migrate from Ethereum

After going through the Ecofolio site and looking into the members, I believe this team could pull  off their proposal. My only concern is the Blockchain Ecosystem Lead. I can find nothing about the individual so I can't say as to their proficiencies.
There is no technical documentation included with this proposal or development roadmap to accurately review how successful implementation will be. The KPI's included are super vague.
its not made clear how this dApp will migrate to Cardano from Ethereum or stats to verify the user demand for this protocol today.
There appear to be an established proof of work and that the proposal seek to be transitioned into the Cardano blockchain. The funds and plans in the pipeline appears in line to that end goal.
The proposers seem to have the experience, vision, and commitment needed to implement this proposal.
Clear roadmap and detailed plan. I believe that the proposer will be able to implement it successfully.
The proposal plan is complete, the budget, roadmap and KPI are also great however with no technical docs or ability to measure current users the likelihood of success is uncertain
The budget the team is asking for is split to tackle all the open points, in order to obtain that their token will be sold, hitting the sell target of 1M$.
More information about who and how your blockchain integration is going to be accomplished is needed.
This project needs to include a project plan, detailed roadmap and metrics/KPI's. None of the required information to effectively assess feasibility is included.
The protocol is requesting 1/4 of the dApp funds but provides little to no technical docs or *detailed* project plan/roadmap to support this request.

There is sufficient information to attest to its feasibility as well as how well it addresses the challenges involved in its transition. This could expand into reforestation efforts where a treasury could advance the seeding of new carbon sequestration efforts and create tokens upon successful maturing offsets.

The objectives and definition of success are well-defined. The proposal would benefit from some milestones and a timeline. Despite this, the proposer's previous experience and understanding of the problem reinforce the proposal's feasibility.
Clear performance Indicators, a roadmap and detail budgets for auditing.
This is a detailed proposal that needs to include a Whitepaper describing the protocol in depth + links to current demand of the platform on ethereum mainnet

solution: Assess feasibility and deploy Ekofolio's native EKO and FOLIO tokens on Cardano, adding a sustainable Stablecoin use-case to the project.
experience: Ekofolio founded 2017. Proof of concept completed. Won grant from European Space Agency for development of real-time monitoring of forests.
